TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PackWebRequest extends System.Net.WebRequest
Public NotInheritable Class PackWebRequest Inherits WebRequest
public ref class PackWebRequest sealed : System::Net::WebRequest

summary.span: 對整個 或套件內的某個 提出要求，由 Pack URI 識別。

span.span: Makes a request to an entire or to a in a package, identified by a pack URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] 使用已定義的組件 uri 語法來表示包含在封裝中的部分。 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] use a defined pack uri syntax to refer to parts that are contained in a package. 如需此類別衍生自抽象類別，作業要求和回應的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the abstract class that this class derives from and the operation of requests and responses, see .

span.span: Gets or sets the .

value.span: 配合 Web 要求使用的 Pack URI。

span.span: The to use with pack URI web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是不同於的內部傳回方法。The property is distinct from the of the inner returned by the method.

exception.span: 要設定的指定 無效。

span.span: The specified to set is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ConnectionGroupName { get; set; }
.property instance string ConnectionGroupName
Public Overrides Property ConnectionGroupName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ConnectionGroupName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定連接群組的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the connection group.
The connection group name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓連接群組相關聯的要求。The property enables the request to be associated with a connection group. 連接群組時，應用程式會對相同的伺服器，為不同的使用者提出要求。A connection group is useful when application makes requests to the same server for different users. 屬性為空字串，如果從要求解析快取。The property is an empty string if the request resolves from the cache. 屬性會與內部共用()。The property is shared with the inner ().

MemberSignature.Value: public override long ContentLength { get; set; }
.property instance int64 ContentLength
Public Overrides Property ContentLength As Long
public: virtual property long ContentLength { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Content-length HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets the Content-length HTTP header.

value.span: 內容長度，以位元組表示。

span.span: The content length, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，URI 通訊協定的組件不會處理要求的資訊以外[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。Note that the pack URI protocol does not process information in the request other than the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]. 基於最傳統 （例如估計的 POST 資訊大小），無須為此屬性。For most traditional purposes (such as estimating the size of POST information), there is no need for this property. 如果從解析要求會傳回 0快取。 returns 0 if the request resolves from the cache. 屬性會與內部共用()。The property is shared with the inner ().

exception.span: 不支援 Set， 屬於唯讀。

span.span: Set is not supported, is read-only.

Public Overrides Property ContentType As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Content-type HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets the Content-type HTTP header.
The contents of the header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，URI 通訊協定的組件不會處理要求的資訊以外[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。Note that the pack URI protocol does not process information in the request other than the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]. （例如判斷 POST 資訊的類型） 的大部分用途而言，沒有任何使用這個屬性。For most purposes (such as determining the type of POST information), there is no use for this property. 如果從解析要求會傳回空字串快取。 returns an empty string if the request resolves from the cache. 屬性會與內部共用()。The property is shared with the inner ().

span.span: Gets or sets the authentication credentials.

value.span: 搭配要求所使用的驗證認證。

span.span: The authentication credentials to use with the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套件快取的要求使用他們自己的快取的認證。Requests to the package cache use their own cached credentials. 屬性會與內部共用()。The property is shared with the inner ().

span.span: Gets the inner .

returns.span: 如果要求解析為有效的傳輸通訊協定 (例如 http 或 ftp)，就是從內部 URI 建立的 ，而如果要求從 快取解析，就是以 null URI 建立的 。

span.span: A created from the inner-URI if the request resolves to a valid transport protocol such http or ftp; or a created with a null-URI if the request resolves from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供進階的案例並不需要進行正常作業。The is provided for advanced scenarios only and is not needed for normal operation.

exception.span: 內部 URI 不會解析為有效的傳輸通訊協定 (例如 http 或 ftp)，此要求也不能從 解析。

span.span: The inner URI does not resolve to a valid transport protocol such as http for ftp, nor can the request be resolved from the .

summary.span: 傳回要求的回應資料流。

span.span: Returns the response stream for the request.
The response stream for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簽章的基底類別，傳回型別的值。Per the signature of the base class, returns value of type . 傳回的值，實際上為類型特有的 pack URI 通訊協定的回應。The return value it is actually of type specific to the response of the pack URI protocol. 應用程式完成時，應該呼叫方法資料流。The method should be called when the application is finished with the stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Net.WebHeaderCollection Headers { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Net.WebHeaderCollection Headers
Public Overrides Property Headers As WebHeaderCollection
public: virtual property System::Net::WebHeaderCollection ^ Headers { System::Net::WebHeaderCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Net::WebHeaderCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與此要求相關聯的標頭名稱/值組之集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of header name/value pairs associated with the request.
A header collection object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封裝快取要求包含有效，但在要求標頭集合空白。Package cache requests include a valid but otherwise empty header collection in their requests. 屬性會與內部共用()。The property is shared with the inner ().

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Method { get; set; }
.property instance string Method
Public Overrides Property Method As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Method { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定搭配 Pack URI 要求使用的通訊協定方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the protocol method to use with the pack URI request.

value.span: 執行這個要求的通訊協定方法名稱。

span.span: The protocol method name that performs this request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回空字串，如果從要求解析快取。The property returns an empty string if the request resolves from the cache. 要求參考外部的 Web 要求，例如 http 或 ftp 時，才會設定屬性。The property is only set when request references an external Web request, such as http or ftp. 屬性會與內部共用()。The property is shared with the inner ().

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool PreAuthenticate { get; set; }
.property instance bool PreAuthenticate
Public Overrides Property PreAuthenticate As Boolean
public: virtual property bool PreAuthenticate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定一個值，指出是否要預先驗證要求。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to preauthenticate the request.

value.span: 若要傳送www-authenticate HTTP 標頭與初始要求; 否則。

span.span: to send a WWW-authenticate HTTP header with the initial request; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`false`要求解析從快取，而且沒有任何預先驗證配置，組件 URI 通訊協定。The property returns `false` for requests resolved from the cache; there is no pre-authentication scheme for the pack URI protocol. 屬性會與內部共用()。The property is shared with the inner ().

span.span: Gets or sets the network proxy for Internet access.
The to use for Internet access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會與內部共用()。The property is shared with the inner ().

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Timeout { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Timeout
Public Overrides Property Timeout As Integer
public: virtual property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要求逾時前的時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time before the request times out.

value.span: 等待要求逾時之前的毫秒數。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait before the request times out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套件快取的要求執行不會逾時。解析的要求快取，傳回 – 1 的值。Requests to the package cache do not time out. For requests that resolve from the cache, returns a value of –1. 屬性會與內部要求共用 ()。The property is shared with the inner request ().

summary.span: 取得或設定預設的驗證認證。

span.span: Gets or sets the default authentication credentials.

value.span: 搭配 Pack URI 要求所使用的預設驗證認證。

span.span: The default authentication credentials to use with the pack URI request.
